sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set the choice value to "multiple choice without None" in the dictionary</description>
        <name>Chg - Set Risk field choice</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (!pm.isZboot())
        return;

    var table = "change_request";
    var column = "risk";

    var grChangeDict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    grChangeDict.addQuery("name", table);
    grChangeDict.addQuery("element", column);
    grChangeDict.query();
    if (grChangeDict.next()) {
        grChangeDict.setValue("choice", "3");
        grChangeDict.update();
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-19 18:56:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3d1af419c35c101035ae3f52c1d3ae4c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Chg - Set Risk field choice</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Core" source="com.snc.change_management">a39309476da620100acb70b35343307a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3d1af419c35c101035ae3f52c1d3ae4c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-19 18:56:26</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
